item.title: White Van Parked outside my home, 25th July
item.description:
Man living in van outside my home with three port hole windows looking directly into my bedroom on the ground floor - the van is parked outside 38 Windus Road and is too large and blocking the view of the road and some natural light.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Windus Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Two massive trees outside no 47 need to be pruned, 25th July
item.description:
One London plane tree was implicated in subsidence claim ten years ago and has been left to grow massive. And it's neighbour a lime tree is also huge and causing the ground to sink around the property
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Samos Road, Anerley, London

item.title: Wet leaves outside number 6 and 8 nursery avenue, 25th July
item.description:
There is a large tree between numbers 6 and 8 nursery avenue and the birds have attacked it which has caused the leaves to fall on the floor, there its lot of leaves and with the wet weather its really slippery and there is elderly people and children down this road. Can this please be looked into urgently
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nursery Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish chute completely blocked, 25th July
